question: Is Dublin at most 210km from Galway County?
Where is the Dorset county located?
Does County Galway contain Claregalway?
sparql: ASK { yago:County_Galway geo:hasGeometry  ?rep1 . ?rep1 geo:asWKT ?WKT1 . yago:Claregalway geo:hasGeometry  ?rep2 . ?rep2 geo:asWKT ?WKT2 . FILTER(geof:contains(?WKT1, ?WKT2)) }
context: ASK { yago:County_Galway geo:hasGeometry  ?rep1 . ?rep1 geo:asWKT ?WKT1 . yago:Claregalway geo:hasGeometry ?rep2 . ?rep2 geo:asWKT ?WKT2 .  FILTER(geof:sfContains(?WKT2, ?WKT1)) }

question: Does Corfu have any beaches?
sparql: ASK { yago:County_Galway geo:hasGeometry  ?rep1 . ?rep1 geo:asWKT ?WKT1 . yago:Claregalway geo:hasGeometry  ?rep2 . ?rep2 geo:asWKT ?WKT2 . FILTER(geof:contains(?WKT1, ?WKT2)) }
context: ASK  { ?x rdf:type <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_beach> ; geo:hasGeometry ?cGeom. ?cGeom geo:asWKT ?cWKT. <http://yago-knowledge.org/resource/Corfu> geo:hasGeometry ?iGeom. ?iGeom geo:asWKT ?iWKT . }

question: Give me a stream that crosses at least two lakes.
sparql: SELECT ?stream WHERE { ?stream rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_stream . ?stream geo:hasGeometry ?sGeo . ?sGeo geo:asWKT ?sWKT . ?lake rdf:type y2geoo:OSM_lake . ?lake geo:hasGeometry ?lGeo . ?lGeo geo:asWKT ?lWKT . FILTER(geof:sfCrosses(?sWKT,?lWKT)) . } GROUP BY ?stream HAVING(COUNT(?lake)>=3) LIMIT 1
context:
SELECT DISTINCT ?c9 WHERE {
	?c38 a <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_lake>. ?c38 geo:hasGeometry ?cGeometry38. ?cGeometry38 geo:asWKT ?cWKT38. 
	?c9 a <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/OSM_stream>. ?c9 geo:hasGeometry ?cGeometry9. ?cGeometry9 geo:asWKT ?cWKT9. 
	?c38 <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/hasArea> ?p38 . 
	?c38 <http://kr.di.uoa.gr/yago2geo/ontology/hasArea> ?p38 . 
	FILTER (geof:sfCrosses (?cWKT9, ?cWKT38))
}
ORDER BY ASC (?p38) LIMIT 1
